name: Welcome to your cozy apartment away from home! !
description: Welcome to our bright, sunny, quaint, and humble abode!  A warm peaceful clean apartment situated in a lively friendly neighborhood.  Close to shops, restaurants and outdoor farmers markets.  A short cab or bus ride to downtown Athens and the Acropolis.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is in a prime downtown location, close to many shops and services including grocery stores, restaurants, drug store, fast food delivery, hair salons, & outdoor farmers markets, plus a convenience store next door. It's also a short bus ride or 5 euro cab ride to the ancient center of Monsateraki , Plaka and the base of the Acropolis.
3 sets of bed and bath linens provided in drawer under bed and in storage under sofa bed and chaise. Hot water breaker to be turned on 15 minutes prior to use and must be turned off once hot water is being used.
One of the hostess's lives in the building if guests have any questions.
host_about: Hello !  My wife and I live in Toronto and I have a beautiful, cozy apartment in downtown Athens that’s close to many major sites.  It's in a great location with lots to do close by, public transportation, restaurants, pharmacy, grocery & convenience store withing walking distance.

name: Budget Twin | Pella Inn
description:
The only Hostel in Athens, where antiquity, modernity, comfort and value all meets in the best location in the city of Athens with the best view of the Acropolis. The rooftop has a direct view of the Acropolis and is perfect for chilling out, having a good time and meeting other travelers.

Only 10 minutes to Acropolis on foot!
Only 5 minutes to Monastiraki metro station on foot!

Free Internet,
Reception Is Open 24/24 (No Curfew),
Lockers etc
host_about: Pella Inn is situated in the heart of the old town of Athens within walking distance from the famous Acropolis, Monastiraki square and Plaka. The rooms and their balconies have a direct view of the Acropolis, as does the rooftop bar, which is perfect for chilling out, having a good time and meeting other travelers while enjoying the amazing view of the Acropolis and the rest of the city. The nearest metro station, Monastiraki, is only 150 meters away providing easy access to and from the airport, as well as a direct line to the port of Piraeus. The excellent location of Pella Inn gives you immediate access to all the interesting sights of Athens such as the Acropolis, the Ancient Agora, Keramikos, the Olympic Stadium, the National Archaeological Museum, etc. Our friendly staff is always prepared to advise you on how to get around the city, from the tourist sites to places 'off the beaten path'.

name: Urban Loft by Neuvel
description:
Urban Loft by Neuvel - Cozy & elegant loft in the heart of Athens.

In Kypseli, one of the most historic neighborhoods of old Athens, our Urban Loft, renovated in 2022, was transformed into this comfort loft with an open plan space.
A great choice for single travelers, couples, digital nomads and business travelers.

name: Julian's Apartment Athens
description:
Welcome to our cozy Athens apartment, where convenience and comfort meet. We're centrally situated, just a stone's throw from the vibrant city center. Need to get around? No problem – we're a mere 3-minute walk from the subway station, ensuring easy access to all of Athens. The central train station is also conveniently close by.
Whether your visit to Athens is for business or leisure, our small apartment offers the perfect base for your adventures in this vibrant city!

name: Spacious apartment featuring a private terrace
description: Enjoy happy times with your significant other, your family, or your friends while staying in this lovely spacious (50 sqm) lodging. With brand new appliances, and its own private large terrace, it provides a wonderful setting to unwind and enjoy yourself. It is located in a typical Athenian neighbourhood, Gkyzi, close to the city centre! With only 5 min walk from the bleu metro line, which connects the airport to the harbor, it is the ideal starting point to explore the entire metropolitan area.
neighborhood_overview:
The area of Gyzi is a typical Athenian residential area. It is located in the center of Athens while at the same time maintaining the elements of the neighborhood and this is the main contrast that characterizes it. It is one of the areas that when you walk through its streets you look up. Not so much because apartment buildings have some special beauty, but because there is "life" there. Behind the colored awnings, in the conversations that can be heard from the open windows, in the spread clothes that add extra color to the balconies. It has several squares and gathering places that gives it vitality.

It is close to the Athens University of Economics and Business and is bordered by Pedion Areos, which is the largest public park in Athens with the Alsos theatre within. The Pedion tou Areos, meaning Field of Ares, was designed in 1934 and its purpose was to honor the heroes of the Greek Revolution of 1821, 21 of whom are depicted in marble busts standing in the park. name: Haris 302 by VPN Accomodation
description: This cozy appartment is located in the heart of Historical Center of Athens (Plaka), in front of the small byzantine church “Kapnikarea” and within a 2 minute’s walk from a main Monastiraki Metro station, the “Tower of the Winds” and the “Library of Hadrian”. Close to the Acropolis, Monastiraki, Psiri, Thissio, the Ancient Agora and Syntagma. The nearby train, bus and tram stations provide easy transportation to everywhere you want to go.

name: Urban Cocoon
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Modern Bright Home VIPGreece
description:
Welcome to your modern bright retreat in Athens! Our new stylish apartment combines modern elegance with homey comfort, making it the perfect choice for up to 4 guests. Whether you're a family, a group of friends, or business travelers, you'll enjoy an unforgettable stay in the heart of the city.

Experience the best of Athens from this bright and beautifully apartment. Book now and make this chic apartment your home away from your home!
